alert.note: Alert for Reynolds (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 5:14AM CST until further notice by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in St Louis MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following river in Missouri... Black River near Annapolis. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...The river is currently rising and expected to crest around noon on Saturday around 9.0 feet. It will fall below flood stage around 6 PM on Saturday. * WHERE...Black River near Annapolis. * WHEN...From early this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Annapolis Road on the east bank of the Black River south of Lesterville begins flooding close to this height. This is the only road directly connecting Annapolis and Lesterville. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:15 AM CST Saturday the stage was 7.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 9.0 feet this afternoon. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Wed Thu Black River Annapolis 8.0 7.6 Sat 4 am 4.8 3.9 3.7 3.7 MSG &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Rainfall heavier than forecast could cause river levels to rise even higher than predicted. The NationalWeather Service will monitor this developing situation and issue follow up statements as conditions change. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
